item.title: CVE-2024-32091|2024-04-15T09:02:08.810Z -- Tonjoo -- Sangar Slider
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tonjoo Sangar Slider.This issue affects Sangar Slider: from n/a through 1.3.2.
